MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForceLog() cil managed

Docs.summary: Forces all log records to disk.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Worker and CRM Compensator use this method to write records lazily to the log, which means they are not made durable until they have been forced to the log. Calling <xref:System.EnterpriseServices.CompensatingResourceManager.Clerk.ForceLog%2A> makes all log records that have been written durable on disk.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ForgetLogRecord() cil managed

Docs.summary: Does not deliver the last log record that was written by this instance of this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This can only be used to forget the last record, there is no concept of nesting; that is, "Write, Forget, Write, Forget" is valid, but "Write, Write, Forget, Forget" is not. A log record that has been forgotten is not delivered to the Compensating Resource Manager (CRM) Compensator during transaction outcome notifications.
